pkgmetadata.longdescription: Library Driven Compound Profiling in Gas Chromatography - Mass Spectrometry Data // Automated quantification of metabolites by targeting mass spectral/retention time libraries into full scan-acquired gas chromatography - mass spectrometry (GC-MS) chromatograms. Baitmet outputs a table with compounds name, spectral matching score, retention index error, and compounds area in each sample. Baitmet can automatically determine the compounds retention indexes with or without co-injection of internal standards with samples.
